mapper.select: select a.color color,a.productSize productSize,a.userId userId,a.productId productId, productName,a.amount amount,a.price price,originalName, saveFileName,orderSelect, superProduct from cart a,product b where a.productId=b.productId and userId=#{userId} order by productName
select nvl(sum(amount),0) from cart where userId=#{userId}
select nvl(sum(amount*price),0) from cart where userId=#{userId} and orderSelect='yes'
select nvl(sum(amount),0) from cart where userId=#{userId} and orderSelect='yes'
select productId from product where productName='${productName}' and productSize='${productSize}' and color='${color}'
select nvl(count(*),0) amount from cart where userId=#{userId} and productId=#{productId}
mapper.update: update cart set amount=amount+#{amount} where userId=#{userId} and productId=#{productId}
update cart set amount=#{amount} where userId=#{userId} and productId=#{productId}
mapper.delete: delete cart where userId=#{userId} and productId=#{productId}
mapper.select: select orderSelect from cart where userId=#{userId} and productId=#{productId}
